sentences.en: A dark cloud of bees comes swarming out of the hive.
sentences.cn: 黑压压的一大群蜜蜂从蜂巢中飞出来。

sentences.en: A hive can't exist without a queen.
sentences.cn: 蜂房不可无蜂王。

sentences.en: At last a swarm settled in a hive.
sentences.cn: 终于有一群蜂落进了蜂巢.

sentences.en: Bees can be smoked from their hive.
sentences.cn: 用烟能把蜜蜂从蜂巢中熏出来.

sentences.en: Can you tell me how many bees there are in the hive?
sentences.cn: 你能否告诉我这个蜂巢里有多少蜜蜂?

sentences.en: hived off the department into another division.
sentences.cn: 从该部门分离出来进入另一分支

sentences.en: I've never seen such a hive of industry.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过这么忙碌的工业区.

sentences.en: In the morning the house was a hive of activity.
sentences.cn: 早上，房子里一片繁忙景象。

sentences.en: The bees were humming around the hive.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂在蜂箱周围嗡嗡地叫.

sentences.en: The construction site was a hive of activity.
sentences.cn: 建筑工地上一片繁忙景象.

sentences.en: The hive is full of beeswax.
sentences.cn: 蜂房里满是蜂蜡。

sentences.en: The hive is made of wood.
sentences.cn: 这蜂箱是用木材做的.

sentences.en: The most important member of any hive is the queen bee.
sentences.cn: 任何一个蜂房中最重要的成员都是蜂王。

sentences.en: the weekly magazine hived off by the BBC.
sentences.cn: 从英国广播公司分立出来的周刊。

sentences.en: The whole construction site was a hive of activity.
sentences.cn: 整个建筑工地一派繁忙的景象.

sentences.en: The whole hive flew after the queen bee.
sentences.cn: 整个蜂群跟着蜂王飞舞.

sentences.en: The whole hive was busy.
sentences.cn: 整个蜂群都在忙碌.

sentences.en: This marketplace was once a hive of activity.
sentences.cn: 这个市场曾经熙熙攘攘。

sentences.en: What a hive of industry!
sentences.cn: 多么喧闹而繁忙的工业区 啊 !

sentences.en: What people must remember is that one hive quickly become two, two become four and four become eight.
sentences.cn: 人们一定要记住的是，一个蜂巢很快会变成两个，两个变成四个，四个变成八个。

words.tran_cn: 蜂房，蜂巢；热闹的场所；熙攘喧闹的人群

phrases.tran_cn: (主英)（尤指生意）划分出来，分离出来（尤指从公有变为私有）

trans.tran_cn: 蜂箱，蜂巢，蜂群，喧闹地区
trans.tran_en: a small box where  bees  are kept, or the bees that live in this box

trans.tran_cn: 群居；入蜂房；生活在蜂房中
